column4: my sound does not seem as loud as it was in windows as it is on ubuntu is there a cause for that?
use alsamixer or gnome-mixer to bring up the mixer levels
are there any controls for a 20 dB speaker boost or anything further right along the mixer?
also might want to try alsamixer. alsamixer exposes more controls. even if master is at 100%, PCM or something else might not be full
